General.Name: Siwani Makmur Tbk
General.Description: PT Siwani Makmur Tbk provides equipment maintenance and repair services. The company was formerly known as PT Van Der Horst Indonesia, Tbk and changed its name to PT Siwani Makmur Tbk in 2000. PT Siwani Makmur Tbk was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Teluk Betung No. 38, Central Jakarta, Indonesia
